tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quality_control_inspection (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_result BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE quality_control_inspection (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
    defect_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE QualityControlInspections (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_result VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE quality_control_inspections (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
    product_id INT,
    inspection_result BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
    unit_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE inspection_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_text TEXT,
    is_approved BOOLEAN
);
CREATE TABLE inspections ( inspection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, inspector_id UUID, product_id UUID, inspection_date DATE, result VARCHAR(20) );
CREATE TABLE inspectors ( inspector_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), specialty VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE products ( product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(50), category VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE reports ( report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, inspection_id UUID, report_date DATE, inspector_id UUID, report_text TEXT );
CREATE TABLE analysis ( analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, report_id UUID, analysis_date DATE, findings TEXT );
